articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on December 6 received a message from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, in reply to his message sent to the latter.
					 In the message Raul Castro Ruz expressed his sincere gratitude on behalf of the party, the government and the people of Cuba to Kim Jong Un for sending a message of sympathy as regards hurricane Sandy that hit Cuba, causing huge damage.
